metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1285 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Apache log4net versions before 2.0.10 do not disable XML external entities when parsing log4net configuration files. This allows for XXE-based attacks in applications that accept attacker-controlled log4net configuration files.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1285` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblog4net1.2-cil - 1.2.10+dfsg-8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: log4net package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.10+dfsg-8').
